Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Eric Marcos "Eric"
Reviews.Content: Works great, I especially like the ipod function. Unfortunately I can't get the usb function to detect my portable hard drive which had some home videos I saved on it.

ProductInfo.Features:
19-inch AUVIO 16-913 720p Widescreen LCD HDTV General Features: Black color
19-inch TFT LCD color display (18.5-inch viewable)
Built-in iPod dock (also charges your iPod/iPhone)
Includes Universal Dock adapters that fits most iPod music players
Also works with iPhone 4 and iPhone 3Gs models
ProductInfo.Name: 19" AUVIO 16-913 720p Widescreen LCD HDTV -16:10 700:1 5ms 1HDMI ATSC/NTSC Tuners w/Dock Connector for Apple iPod/iPhone
